name: InstaDash
description:
Pick up the blinking blue packages from customers' houses and drop them off at the drop-off station, hint, south of the map. Some packages provide more time than others based on distance.

Unfinished but playable... need more effects, sounds, and polish here and there but once I get time I will add to it.

Any ideas or feedback appreciated.

Based on downloads or feedback I will continue the development.

If you like it and want to support me, cash app $jfonseca79  will give a shoutout and a car branded with your name!
